body.name: KOORUI 24 Inch Computer Monitor, Build-in Speakers, FHD 1080p IPS 100Hz, 75 x 75 mm VESA Mountable, Adpitive Sync, Eye Care and Ergonomic Tilt Adjustment
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 11 mins
features: [Narrower Bezels, Bigger Images] The 24 inch computer monitor has IPS screen, FHD 1920 x 1080p resolution and 178°wide viewing angle, you can enjoy a a clear, sharp, and delicate panoramic viewing. Three-side frameless design of the pc monitor is suitable for muilti-screen work. Support VGA(up to 60Hz), HDMI(up to 100Hz)

[Gorgeous visual effects&Eye care] The 24 inch monitor with 99% SRGB (NTSC 72%) can display more realistic images and more saturated colors, present you with impressive visual effects. Flicker-Free technology and blue Light Filter give you comfortable visual experience even in the long-term viewing

[Built-In Speakers] Built-in speaker offer Clear & smooth audio while saving space on your desk. The 24 inch monitor provide video interfaces via HDMI and VGA ports. You can connect it to Xbox, PC and laptops etc. Working, gaming, movies, all perfectly covered with just one monitor

[Ergonomic tilt&VESA Compatible] The KOORUI 24 monitor stand can be quickly installed and dismantled, also supports 75*75mm VESA stand, which make it easy for you to move and place the monitor. You can choose a best viewing angle through tilt 5 degrees forward and 20 degrees back

[After-sales Guarantee] KOORUI commit to manufacturing monitors over 20 years, we continue providing high-quality computer monitors and premium services, included 30 days money back, 6 months replacement, 3 years warranty. Any damage, malfunction or missing accessories, please feel free to contact us

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best monitor in this price range!
reviews.reviewText: This monitor has good picture quality and works well for this price range. The menu could use some work, but other than that I have no reason to not love this monitor. When it comes, it's easy to set up the stand and plug it into the power and your computer. It took me no more than 5 minutes to set up the stand and plug it in. The screen is bright enough and you can change the screen brightness anytime you want to. If you are looking for a good quality monitor that won't cost an arm and a leg, I definitely recomend this monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for the price, great picture even with the light coming in from the window, no reflections. The stand connected easily.Some people are saying it didn’t work for them, but I think it’s because if you don’t have something connected to it, ready to go, it does not look like it’s turning on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The brightness is the only thing that’s a problem for me. Other than that, a great buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don't be deterred by this not being a brand that, frankly, no one has ever heard of! It was nice and easy to put together, with an awesome picture quality. It's nice and sharp. Just as good as the much more expensive name brands, which in all honesty probably use the exact same parts with a different brand sticker on the outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable but high quality
reviews.reviewText: I really love my monitor! I just wanted something that worked for my Mac mini but wasn’t too expensive. I was concerned about the screen not looking as high quality, but for the price this monitor was, the screen quality is great! I’m really enjoying it! 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Company will not respond monitor stopped working within a month and half
reviews.reviewText: I first got this monitor and it worked well. It was sometimes scrolling but I thought it was that i needed an update. I had a new pc and set it up with this monitor. Problem continued but not to bad. Then after a little over a month. It completely stopped working. Total black screen. Contacted Amazon says can’t help 30 day warranty was up. I contacted this company 5 times now, I’ve given them 2 weeks for a reply and still radio silence. Finally went and bought a Samsung monitor that works perfectly and same price. I absolutely will NEVER BUY FROM THIS COMPANY AGAIN!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this monitor because of the price, and because it seemed to have favorable reviews. I took a gamble buying a monitor whose brand I never heard of. I didn't intend to use it for gaming or anything. I just wanted a basic monitor to connect to my server and for a graphana display. I was not disappointed. The mount is cheaply made, yes, but it works. The display itself though was far more than I expected for the price. It has a crisp, clear picture and I've had no issues.My only gripes are the stand, as I said, and that it requires a DC power brick, not a standard PC power cord. But it's VESA mountable, which is how I intend to use it. So yeah, it's not the best monitor ever, but for the image quality and the value for price, I can't justify removing a star. It is a very good purchase for the price. I'll definitely buy more.I'm glad I gave this brand a chance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the clarity and coloring of the screen. It's great for all my work needs and was easy to set up!

24" 100hz IPS Monitor for $139, Can't complain. Very nice picture, good brightness, clean text. Menus are clean and easy to use. Can't get much better from the Big names.Paired with This Vivo Stand:https://www.amazon.ca/dp/B083G8GDGD?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_detailsOverall sofar: 5/5.

reviews.reviewTitle: Decent, but can't hide it's cheapness.
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent budget monitor for gaming but overall unremarkable. It's not very bright at maximum and the image is a little washed out and not very vibrant. However, it can be had on sale for less than half of what a comparable Samsung or LG panel would cost and you get about 80% of the performance. Playing Cyberpunk on this panel was still great fun and the fast refresh rate enhances the action vs 60 or 75Hz. 144 or 165 Hz is smoother, but not by that much. The difference between 60 and 100Hz is huge. From 100 -144/165Hz, noticable but less so.I don't know how to tune or calibrate monitors but this panel gives you loads of settings to adjust so I'm sure the image can be improved by someone with the know-how.If you're buying this as a budget alternative to a higher end monitor, you might be let down.If you're buying this as an upgrade from an old screen on the cheap, you'll probably enjoy it.Also worth noting is that it's extremely lightweight - I bought it specifically to take with me to LAN parties and it's perfect for that.
I bought this for $110 and it works amazing as a second monitor. The hz and size are very good for the price Aswell. Good product 👍
